text: "She was in the studio all night last night until it was time for her to leave for the airport to catch a 5:45 am flight," the statement continued. "The stress of all of the traveling and working so incessantly has exhausted her. She will be relaxing for the next few days."
title: Singer Brandy hospitalized after losing consciousness on plane

meta_data.description: The songstress was hospitalized Friday after falling unconscious on a plane before takeoff.
